template.name: Sendgrid API Provider
template.description: Sendgrid API Provider to retrieve account information.

item.name: Sendgrid IPs Remaining
item.description: The number of IPs that can still be added to the user.

item.name: Sendgrid IPs Purchase Cost
item.description: The current cost to add an IP.

item.name: Sendgrid Security - Authorized IP - Recent IP Authorization Activity Count
Sendgrid Security - Authorized IP Address Count

trigger.name: Sendgrid Authorized IP Control Count Changed
Sendgrid Authorized IP Control Not Configured

item.name: Sendgrid Settings - TLS Valid Cert Required
Sendgrid Settings - Mail - Address Whitelist Count
Sendgrid Settings - Mail - Address Whitelist Enabled
Sendgrid Settings - Mail - Forward Spam Reports Email Address
Sendgrid Settings - Mail - Forward Spam Reports Enabled
Sendgrid Supressions Recent Invalid Emails Count
Sendgrid Supression Recent Spam Reports Count
sendgrid.api.tracking.settings.data
item.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all tracking settings on your account.

item.name: Sendgrid Settings Tracking Email Opens Enabled
Sendgrid Verified Senders - Domain Warn - Hard Failures Count
Sendgrid Verified Senders - Domain Warn - Soft Failures Count
Sendgrid Verified Senders - Domain Verification Completed
Sendgrid Verified Senders - Sender Verification Completed
Sendgrid Webhook Events - Group Resubscribe Enabled
Sendgrid Webhook Events - Group Unsubscribe Enabled
Sendgrid Webhook Events - Spam Report Enabled

trigger.recovery_expression: last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.used) < last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.total)*.50
trigger.name: Sendgrid Credits 50% Used

trigger.recovery_expression: last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.used) < last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.total)*.75
trigger.name: Sendgrid Credits 75% Used

trigger.recovery_expression: last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.used) < last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.total)*.9
trigger.name: Sendgrid Credits 90% Used

trigger.recovery_expression: last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.used) < last(/Sendgrid API Provider/sendgrid.api.credits.total)
trigger.name: Sendgrid Credits 100% Used
